name: Xmas Daze
description:
While not yet unfrozen from your cryo-sleep, you crashed on planet Xmas. You feel an unexplainable calling to collect a set number of presents and tree ornaments. Go forth with your unanimated grace and achieve that dream!

[Made for the 32bit  Holiday Jam 2021]

Controls

Keyboard

  • move - WASD keys
  • rotate camera left - Q
  • rotate camera right - E
  • jump - Space/J - jump

Controller

  • move - analog stick/D-pad
  • rotate camera left - L/L1
  • rotate camera right - R/R1
  • jump - DualShock X, Xbox A, Nintendo X
Assets
  • Snow Texture from https://freepbr.com/
